title: Binary.Domain-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Binary.Domain-R.G.Mechanics 

Year: 2012 
Publication Type: Repack 
Tablet: Not required 
Language: RUS, ENG 
Voice set Language: ENG

Description: 

Team shooter Binary Domain created under the guidance of Toshihiro Nagoshi  
-one of the authors of the famous series Yakuza. Tokyo, 2080. On the streets 
of the metropolis in fierce fighting people and robots. International 
peacekeeping force, sent to stabilize the situation, fights in abandoned 
areas. But in a war with such an unusual and seemingly alien to human 
nature of the enemy soldiers are beginning to wonder whether what they 
are doing? Does the machine have become so humane? Or is it people are 
gradually turning into robots? Especially for Binary Domain created an 
innovative artificial intelligence. Opponents will be able to assess 
the situation on the battlefield and be responsive to changes. 
Therefore, players will have to carefully plan their actions 
and do not forget to be careful. Only then can they succeed!

Features: 

Two-faced city. Discover two different Tokyo started and destroyed the 
"lower city" and a great technologically advanced "upper city". 
Irreversible effects. At the height of the battle motivate his 
comrades; Marshall trusting relationships in the unit, check its 
ability to promptly make difficult decisions, knowing what the 
consequences they may lead. Every action, every choice, every 
word can change everything! 
Invaluable information. Fully destructible, but at the same time 
extremely hardy robots can adapt to the damage inflicted by them, 
so do not miss the opportunity to scrutinize the enemy, find its 
strengths and weaknesses, and then use this knowledge in action. 
Fully prepared. At your disposal a vast arsenal of unique weapons 
- modify any! And do not forget to improve the ability to become 
faster, stronger, more accurate shooting. 
War online. Variety of multiplayer modes make it possible to test 
himself in the battles on the network - shoulder to shoulder with 
friends or against each other.

System requirements: 

Operating system: Windows XP (SP3), Windows Vista (SP2), Windows 7
